summary: CI job to enforce plugin version bumps on PRs that change plugin/ files
context: Plugin changes were shipping without version bumps, making it impossible to track what version users have. Need CI enforcement to prevent this.
rationale: Added plugin-version-check job that only runs on PRs (not pushes to main, since direct commits happen). Uses git diff to detect plugin/ changes and checks both version files for version line changes. Excludes plugin.json itself from the "changed files" check to avoid false positives when only the version is bumped.

alternatives.reason_rejected: Pre-commit hooks are local-only, can be bypassed, and don't protect the main branch
Auto-bumping removes human intent from version decisions (patch vs minor vs major)
